MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: 40 sheep were found dead, their carcasses "blistered", after a Basque rancher saw a helicopter go over his flock.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A wave of cattle rustling and sightings occurred here.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A farmer spotted a helicopter hovering above a pasture, shining a spotlight to the ground. Lawmen in 20 vehicles unsuccessfully gave chase.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Sometime during Early AM. A non-bubble-type chopper rose out of a field, headed north then turned south toward the Missouri line, then vanished.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 3 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: When a deputy saw a helicopter hovering over a farm, he turned off the lights on his cruiser and the lights on the helicopter went out. Hog-rustlings had occurred in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 4 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Exact date unknown, likely April or May. One night, a woman searched on foot for her dog in a rural area near Berryville. She saw what appeared to be a silver helicopter sitting on an adjacent golf course. Approaching a clearing, she saw humans in white coats or uniforms, plus 2 non-humans she had encountered weeks before - all gathered over a horse which seemed to be in pain. She was spotted, ran through the woods, back by the golf course (the helicopter was gone). She was "zapped" with something, burning her, making her ill. This is the "Ordeal In Arkansas" case from STIGMATA #4(1978). At that time, it was not known that the event actually occurred in 1973.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 21 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Six witnesses saw a dark green helicopter flying low over pastures.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 5 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Exact date unknown. Farmer saw green helicopter without markings. 3 to 4 days later, 35 head of cattle turned up missing.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 6 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A "white, unmarked cargo-type helicopter" was observed by Mrs. Phyllis Beutell and her son as the craft lifted up from a field containing cattle. A neighbor's cow disappeared a day or 2 later.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 7 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Two or three reports of low-flying helicopters circling cattle in fields. At least one mutilation occurred in the area in May.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 8 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Reports of low-flying helicopters without lights "all summer long", preceding a mutilation wave that erupted in August. Cloud County Sheriff Fred Modlin said helicopters had been seen over cattle loading pens.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 9 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Several mystery helicopter reports, plus rustling complaints in latter 2 counties.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Sainte Genevieve, Reynolds and Iron Counties, MISSOURI
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 10 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Deputy Louis Layton reported seeing an unmarked transport-type helicopter over a ranch near St. Marys.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 11 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Mid August. Two deputies watch helicopter hovering 20-25 feet over cattle on a ranch.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 12 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter was observed which matched "the description of the one suspected of being used for "rustling".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Between Chester and Red Bud, Randolph County, ILLINOIS
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 13 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A Mr. Peters fired two warning shots over a helicopter which he observed hovering low and shining a light on his cattle. The chopper, described as "quiet-running", turned out its lights and fled.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 14 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Witness heard sound of an apparent helicopter for 30 minutes near Jonesboro.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 15 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Also Aug. 26-27th. 41 reports of unmarked helicopters were received by the Pike County sheriff.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 16 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Lights on a helicopter suddenly went out as a deputy watched. Radar picked up low-flying aircraft slowly circling in Pike and Adams Counties.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 17 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A low-flying "Army-type helicopter" upsets a man's cattle, flying over several times. The witness, through field glasses, notes a "large white spot" near the tail of the chopper.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 19 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Or Oct. James Hagler, a victim of pig-nappers, saw a helicopter over his property on 3 occasions. The third time, he was fired upon from the chopper. Hagler fired back, then someone on the ground fired at Hagler. Law officers searched but found nothing. After they left, Hagler was fired upon again. A second search was again fruitless.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Near Pond, Saint Louis County, MISSOURI
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 20 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Unmarked, charcoal-black "Chinook" helicopter lands on a beach early one morning. Men in black pajama-type uniforms & carrying M-16 rifles get out; threaten local lawman who asks too many questions. Other choppers, black but smaller, seen out over ocean. Reportedly, Air Force was transporting warheads; one chopper had trouble and had to land. The men in the Chinook were said to be a security unit protecting the downed craft.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 9 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Twenty shots were fired from a black twin-engine plane and a white helicopter at Robert Smith as he cultivated a cornfield on his tractor. Neither craft was marked. Smith could see a figure brace himself against the helicopter door as he fired. Both the helicopter and the airplane had been seen over the area "all spring".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Through Aug 14th. Helicopters, strange lights seen each night, said sheriff. In July, August, 7 mutilations occurred near Bloomfield.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter hovered and directed a beam of light onto a pasture. A mutilated cow was found in the same pasture on 8-18-74.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 3 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Through Aug 17th. Sheriff Herb Thompson reported that helicopters were seen "every night".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 4 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Joel Dendinger, driving SW of Hartington, saw a helicopter scanning his neighbor's field with a searchlight. A car was also seen shining a spotlight in the same direction. A dead cow - not mutilated - was found the next morning where the helicopter had been seen closest to the ground.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 10 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Mutilated calf found 9-6-74. No helicopters were seen that date but several sightings were reported in the Elgin area around that time.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 5 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Gerry Hochstein & Gerry Lammers saw a helicopter which they followed for 3 miles until it appeared to land on the Rudy Wesseln farm. A mutilated calf was found on the adjoining Kleinschmidt property 9-16-74.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 6 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Two unidentified helicopters sighted, one north and one south of Atkinson. At least two mutilations occurred in the county in October.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 7 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A neighbor had seen a cow down on the Douglas Werkmeister farm Tuesday evening. It was examined Wednesday morning and found to be mutilated. The deafening popping sound of a helicopter was heard over the farm on Wed. night. A chopper circled low over other area farms that night.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 8 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Possibly-mutilated cow found at 7:00 AM. Chopper seen circling about 1 hour later.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Early to mid-February. Mrs. A. D. Cruse said her family heard an "awfully loud" low-flying helicopter around 10:30 one night. A cow of theirs was found mutilated the next morning. Other mutilations occurred in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Early to mid-February. There was at least one unidentified helicopter sighting in the county during a period in which two, possibly three, mutilations occurred.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 3 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A trooper was advised by a motorist that he saw a small, black helicopter as it lifted off the ground near Owentown, NE of Tyler. Mutilations were occurring in the area during this period.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 4 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified caller reported to the sheriff's office that a helicopter was seen along US highway 271 north of Tyler. Something was hanging beneath the craft and the caller thought it looked like a calf. The report was classified as "unfounded" but is of interest in view of the other report in the same area at the same time (above).
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 5 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Winona cattleman Billy Joe Davis had suffered 3 mutilations and patrolled his farm at night. He saw a helicopter with a bright blinking light on the sides and a constant white light underneath. The craft flew away as he approached it.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 6 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Billy Joe Davis had a helicopter sighting identical to that of the previous night.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 7 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Several reports of helicopters along the Sabine River bottoms. A mutilated cow was found on the Kenneth Johnson property in this area on 2-9-75.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 8 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Unidentified helicopters began a several-month flyover of these counties, spotlighting cattle herds. 3 mutes in Coryell Co. in Feb.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 9 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Uncertain whether mutilations occurred here; but some did occur in adjoining Morris, Wood & Upshur Counties. On this night, law officers talked with the occupants of a landed helicopter. They claimed to be student pilots from Barksdale AFB in NW Louisiana. The exact location of this incident is unconfirmed but is believed to have been Camp County.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 10 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter chased a car for 5 miles near Becker. A mutilation had been discovered on 2-22-75 in Henderson Co., south of Becker. There were at least 4 additional helicopter sightings in Kaufman & Henderson Counties.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 11 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Two deputies - Carl Hall and Alton Ashworth - each responded to separate reports of helicopters on the ground. When each drove up, they saw a helicopter which took off immediately.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 12 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Other helicopter sightings occurred after midnight. Also, undetailed reports from adjoining Henderson County.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 13 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Stanley Jasik was 1/4-mile away when he watched a silver helicopter land in a grassy field, 2 miles from the San Antonio River. Jasik saw a dead cow in the area. The owner then examined the carcass on 2-26-75 and found it to be mutilated.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 14 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Deputy Carl Hall reported that at least 3 helicopter sightings occurred in south and east Kaufman County. There was one report of a "red flare" seen by witnesses following the departure of a helicopter from the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 15 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A farmer watched an unmarked helicopter hover over his property. It flew away as he prepared to shoot at it.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 16 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Est. date. TV reporter Horace McQueen rode with a trooper as they chased a low-flying chopper several miles.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 17 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: No mutilation link, but... An oval object emitting multi-colored lights was seen hovering over a field; observed by two witnesses for 45+ minutes. A helicopter flew near the object. Inquiries to determine the origin of the chopper were fruitless.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 131 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A "military helicopter" encountered icing problems in bad weather and had to land at the Dairy Queen in Liberty City. The pilot obtained an alternate flight plan from Barksdale AFB in NW Louisiana and resumed the trip.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 18 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A continuation of a series of lowflying unidentified helicopter sightings that began in February.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 19 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: SW of Marysville, farmer Art Seematter saw a helicopter go over his property. Later that day he found the carcass of a mutilated cow. The mutilation had occurred sometime since noon on April 5, 1975.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 20 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Early May. A helicopter with red, green and white lights on it was seen 3 nights in a row at about 10:00 PM over the Great Sand Dunes National Monument. No known mutilations occurred at that time although some occurred in late summer. This eastern and southern portion of the San Luis Valley is historically a mutilation and mystery helicopter-prone region (the "Snippy The Horse" event occurred here in 1967).
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 21 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: The reports of low-flying helicopters spotlighting cattle ended (apparently) in May. In response to citizen complaints, the Federal Aviation Administration conducted an investigation in July and August. The Air Force denied having any helicopter activity in the area and, according to the FAA: "The Army was operating some helicopters in (the) area earlier this ye~r, but without more definite information on dates, times, etc., they cannot confirm any specific flights. They stated it is not their policy to fly at night with their lights off. Two military reservations are located to the south of the area in question: The Army's Fort Hood in Coryell County and Gray Air Force Base in Bell County. Cattle mutilations occurred in both counties, with one on Fort Hood
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Daryl Evans of Elizabeth heard a helicopter over his property on the same night a heifer of his was mutilated.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 23 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Early AM. A rancher saw a red & white helicopter land on a knoll 1/4-mile from his house, 16 miles SW of Kiowa. When a witness tried to reach the site, the chopper flew off.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 24 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Three girls on horseback were chased by a low-flying helicopter around 6:00 PM on the Frank Fuchs ranch. At 11:00 PM a helicopter returned to fly low over the ranch. A "brilliant white light" was seen on the bottom of the craft by the frightened witnesses. Another Witness who had seen a similar craft in the same area remarked that "once you see that bright light, you'll never forget it".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 25 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Near the Frank Fuchs ranch, south of Ramah, RANCHLAND FARM NEWS editor-publisher John Hines saw a suspiciously-low-flying helicopter and photographed the craft.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 26 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: "A lot of helicopter activity" was reported in the Peyton area of NE El Paso County. An undetermined number of mutilated sheep were found near here on 7-12-75. In mid-to-late 1975, El Paso Co., Elbert Co., and the eastern plains of Colorado experienced one of the most virulent epidemics of livestock mutilations on record.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 27 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Undersheriff Bill Waugh saw a helicopter west of the county seat of Kiowa. The craft could not be heard but its outline and its cockpit lights could be seen through binoculars by Waugh.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 28 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Law officers, a military helicopter crew and civilian volunteers launched an unsuccessful air and ground search for a "mysterious aircraft", thought to be a helicopter, seen from east of Cripple Creek westward into Park County. The craft alternately flew with and without lights. It appeared to land near Guffey and ground lights were seen approaching the landing site. The craft was seen back in the Cripple Creek area before it finally vanished around 11:00 PM. At least 40 livestock mutilations had been reported in Teller and surrounding counties "in recent weeks".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 29 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Or early evening. In the Elizabeth area, two girls on foot reported being "chased" by a helicopter which flew off when a man on horseback approached. The chopper in this incident was allegedly photographed and tentatively identified as an "Army Bell Ranger".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 30 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: James Pavlica reported hearing a helicopter north of Calhan (see August 9th).
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 31 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter chased a rancher who had ridden out on a trail bike to check his cattle.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 32 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: As on August 7, James Pavlica heard a helicopter north of Calhan. On this date, Pavlica found a black angus steer dead and mutilated.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 33 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter was reported in the Crested Butte area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 34 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Or evening. A youth was baling hay on a tractor when a helicopter "buzzed" him. He fled to his house on the tractor; the helicopter followed and hovered over the house for several minutes.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 35 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: 2 separate reports on 1 day of a helicopter landing on ranches. Mutilations had occurred in the general area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 36 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A man chased the flashing lights of what he described as a helicopter.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 37 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Week of August 10-16. A helicopter was chased off a farm when it attempted to "take a pig". Later that same night, a pig was taken from another farm in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 38 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter is seen over the Gothic area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 39 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Unidentified helicopter over the Saw Tooth area. During August, in addition to several reports of mystery helicopters, at least a half-dozen livestock mutilations occurred in the county.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 40 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter was seen over the rugged Marshall Pass area along the Gunnison/Saguache County line.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 41 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter was heard over a field near rancher Leon Irey's house. One of Irey's calves was found mutilated the next morning. Irey had also been struck by mutilators two weeks earlier.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 42 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Rancher Victor Hillman saw two helicopters in his area, just south of the Kimball County (Nebr.) line. Hillman found, on 8-17-75, a bull of his that had been mutilated.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 43 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter was reported over the Spring Creek area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 44 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A low-flying helicopter was pursued by several law officers in both counties (See Appendix for a more detailed account). At one point the chopper hovered over a SAC missile silo near Bushnell, Nebraska. This last action would turn out to be a precursor of similar activity over military installations in Montana, Maine and Michigan in the following months (again, see Appendix).
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Logan County, Kimball County, NEBRASKA, and COLORADO
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 45 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Cows were mutilated on each of three succeeding nights and were found the following mornings. During the first night, sheriff Ernest Sandoval was cruising a dirt road when he noticed a fire in a rocky area, with a group of people around it. The sheriff radioed for help. Immediately the group of people ran to a nearby helicopter and took off.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 132 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Leaving the sheriff's office after discussing mutilation investigations with Deputy David Ellis, Project Stigma investigators Tom Adams and Gary Massey drove south toward Saguache County on Colorado highway 114. Nearing the county line, they observed a small helicopter (of the Hughes "Cayuse" type) flying west-southwest across the highway toward the Powderhorn Pinos Pass area, where a cattle mutilation had occurred earlier in the week. The helicopter was filmed on Super 8 movie film as it passed out of sight over a ridge. The distance was too great to discern details.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 46 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A low-flying helicopter which vanished quickly was seen northwest of Kimball.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 47 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Farm worker Fred Annance saw a helicopter flying low around the bluffs on a farm south of Pine Bluffs near the Colorado line. Pilot Dave Butler took to the air in a plane but did not see the helicopter. Other strange craft (nocturnal lights) and "many" mutilated animals had been reported in the area around this time.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 48 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter was reported near Taylor Park, in an area where a mutilation occurred approx. 1 to l½ weeks previously.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 49 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter landed briefly 300 feet from a house near Franktown. The chopper was described as the size of a "police helicopter"; solid metal, no bubble, "Army green", with no markings. A woman witness was reportedly "frightened almost to death".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Refs. 50, 51 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A woman observed a helicopter making "low passes" over a pasture near Julesburg.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 52 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Near La Veta, in August, two men watched a helicopter on the ground which quickly took off.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 53 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Unidentified helicopter was seen flying low near Sedgwick.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 54 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Deputy John Lobato observed an unidentified helicopter south of San Luis.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 55 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A small blue helicopter was seen NE of Cripple Creek around 8:00 AM, then was reported hovering over cattle west of Cripple Creek an hour later. Shortly after that, a helicopter was seen NW of Cripple Creek. In this third sighting, photos were reportedly taken of a blue helicopter with a plain white spot on the side. At least 2 very recent livestock mutilations had occurred in the county.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 56 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter was spotted near Kimball.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 57 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Another low-flying helicopter was seen near Sedgwick, in the area of a possible cattle mutilation the first in the county - discovered on this date.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 58 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Deputy John Lobato saw an unidentified helicopter south of San Luis. Two mutilations occurred in the county during the week, including one discovered 9-3-75.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 59 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Sheriff Ernest Sandoval saw what he believed to be a helicopter flying south into New Mexico.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 60 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter flying "underneath radar" was spotted in the area of Sedgwick.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 61 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: 8:00-11:00 PM Near Tujunga, in the mountains north of Burbank and Glendale. Three witnesses watched a brilliant, multi-colored, shapechanging object high in the sky. Also seen, with the naked eye and with binoculars, was one, then 2, helicopters which seemed to fly in a cautious surveillance pattern below the object. Watched off & on for 3 hours before object & 1 chopper vanished together to the west. All the witnesses eyes hurt following the incident. Writer & investigator Ann Druffel tried to no avail to learn the source of the helicopters.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 133 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Sheriff's personnel chased an unidentified helicopter across rangelands around dawn. The mutilated carcass of a cow had been found in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 134 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Two telephone company employees working on a mountaintop relay system saw a helicopter land in a field below. One occupant got out then quickly reentered and the copter flew away. On the same date, two hours later,a deputy saw a dark gray "bubble-top" helicopter flying east out of Mosca Pass (from the direction of the Great Sand Dunes National Monument). The craft had no markings and possessed, thought the deputy, a "noise arrester".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 62 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A family saw a helicopter with something like a "litter basket" hanging beneath it. The yellow and red craft flew over a ridge. The next day a mutilated bull was found beyond the ridge
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 63 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Several helicopter sightings and 2 or 3 mutilations occurred in the county. On 2 occasions, Sheriff Norman Howey observed a helicopter flying low between ridges.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 64 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Weekend of September 6-7. Two cattle mutilations and at least ten mystery helicopter sightings were reported during the weekend.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 65 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter was reported southwest of Julesburg.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 66 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Week of September 7-11. A green helicopter with "gas tanks" on the side was observed on 2 occasions.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 67 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Second week. Residents of Savery area nearColorado border reported unidentified helicopters roaming the area and flickering lights in the mountains after a calf was found mutilated in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 135 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Mrs. Nancy Hing saw and heard a helicopter (an "old beat-up thing") flying low and circling the Balch Springs area east of Dallas. On the 13th, a twin-engine plane was seen circling a pasture where the mutilated carcass of a cow was discovered the following week. At least one other mutilation occurred in the area during that week.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 68 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Deputy Arne Sand heard but did not see what sounded like a helicopter, though unlike any helicopter he had ever heard - "more of a quiet whirr". It was a clear night but Sand could see nothing even when the craft sounded as though it was directly overhead.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 69 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Between Fort Shaw and Choteau, a ranch couple saw a helicopter flying south which turned off its lights as they watched it.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 70 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: An unidentified helicopter landed on a mountain behind the ranch house of Tod Sermon before taking off again and turning on red, green and white lights as it reached an altitude of about 300 feet.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 71 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A family reported that a helicopter chased them as they drove in their truck north of Boone. A second helicopter appeared and the two flew off quickly together.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 72 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Mystery helicopter seen near Eads.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 73 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: On Sunday, the 21st, an independent investigator set up a mobile trailer in eastern Pueblo Co. Equipped with observational hardware and monitoring instrumentation, he maintained watch for UFO & helicopter activity. On the 2nd night of his observation, he fell ill & was taken by friends to Pueblo. Ranch family nearby saw 3 helicopters swoop down & hover over trailer, directing a bright spotlight on the trailer. A small airplane had circled the area previously.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 74 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A man in a pickup truck was run off a dirt road by a helicopter. He called for help on his CB radio and two auxiliary policemen responded to find the victim "frantic". One policeman fired a shot from a 30-30 rifle at the still-hovering helicopter and heard a ricochet. Deputies from 3 counties, guards from the Pueblo Army Depot and Colorado State Policemen chased the helicopter west to the Pueblo airport before it turned to the north and disappeared. The chopper made a noise "like the whistling of air coming from a tire". Other area residents reported being chased by helicopters during this period.

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Near Eastman on Sat., Oct. 4th, 6 cows were found dead, 3 mutilated; owned by Richard & Dwight Boom and Don Beckett. One other cow seemed to be ailing. When they tried to catch and attend to her, she collapsed and died; 4 other cows also seemed to be ill. Wisconsin Dept. of Agriculture diagnostician Dr. A.F. Krohn verified the mutilation of the 3 animals with "a very sharp cutting instrument". Richard Boom reported that a helicopter flew over his property on the night of the 6th. A cow was believed to have been killed & mutilated a few mi. north of Eastman on Oct. 8th or 9th. The cow had just given birth; the calf was dead but untouched.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 137 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A UH-1 "Huey" helicopter crashed in a remote area of the Fort Carson Military Reservation, killing 5 men and injuring five. Speculation was that high winds in the area may have caused the crash, but Public Information Officer Major Arne Anderson refused to speculate on the cause or to release any information on the investigation. However, Lt. Col. S.K. Fisk told the DENVER POST that the cause of the crash was considered to be "unknown".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Refs. 87, 88 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Two reports of helicopters flying low over ranches were called in to the sheriff's office.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 89 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: On Sept. 29th, a mutilated cow was found near Upton. Near Newcastle, on the early morning of Friday, October 3rd, around 3:00 AM, Raymond "Spud" Jones was awakened by a "high-pitched whine, like a jet turbine starting". Neighbors heard it, too. Other neighbors reported to Jones later that day that they had noticed a cow of his lying in a pasture. On Monday, Oct.6th, Jones found the carcass, which had been mutilated. He notified Sheriff Willis Larson. Then, on the night of Tuesday, October 7th, Larson had just returned from delivering specimens from the cow to a crime lab in Cheyenne when, at 8:45 PM, a woman called to report an object that looked like and sounded like a helicopter was hovering over a ridge NE of Newcastle. The sheriff knew the local airport mgr., John Bockman, had a helicopter. But a phone call to Bockman was answered by him; he said he would go out to look for the craft. Larson drove to the top of an adjacent ridge. He told the Univ. of Wyoming BRANDING IRON (10-14-75): "I reached the top of the ridge and saw an object to the west, near Highway 85 North," the sheriff said. "It was an orange, wedge-shaped object, resembling a helicopter in appearance. The tapered end had a bright red light. I was confused and looked at it through the binoculars," he said. "It was making sudden, jerky 'Z' movements, very fast, I thought. I called my wife and asked her to call Bockman to look at it." Bockman was already looking at the object, however. He reported it in the same position as the sheriff. The object descended and Larson lost sight of it. Bockman continued to observe it and saw it go down and its lights go out. "I called for a special deputy to take my position and dispatched another deputy to the south so we could bracket the object in a triangle," said the sheriff. "I then went to the airport. The mail plane was landing at the airport just as I arrived. Bockman pointed the object out to me. Thirty seconds later it went up and disappeared, just like shutting out a light. Later, as we were returning to town, a sudden bright flash lit the sky, like a flashbulb." An hour and a half later, the same lady called and reported the object in the same location. "I went out to check on it again, and the sky was split by five sudden flashes, in very quick succession, centered in the northeast," said the sheriff. Later, a glowing light would appear in the eastern sky, and would be viewed by many residents. Lights rising over trees were reported by campers, brilliant flashes were reported by a motorist, and home owners saw strange lights. Obviously, something strange was happening in the sky around Newcastle on the night of October 7. (Ref. 138)"
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Gloria Claunch saw, through binoculars, a helicopter shining a light on the ground, illuminating what she thought were two men.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 90 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A low-flying helicopter with a bright red light was seen by several witnesses.

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Deputies watched a helicopter land and remain on the ground 3 minutes before taking off. Two "fresh" mutilations were discovered in the area on this date.

Some highflying craft with regulation lights were seen as well as others flying low without lights. Helicopters were sometimes reported with bright searchlights here and in adjoining Costilla County. This light was frequently described by witnesses as "very, very powerful".

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: First half of Oct. A reserve lawman engages in a shootout with a chopper. (See INTRODUCTION)

It "sounded just like an airplane but we could see the top revolving propeller".

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 101 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A family reported seven helicopters flying low over their home near Felt. Five dead cattle had been found in the area around this time; unconfirmed as mutilations.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 102 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Five helicopters buzzed a herd of cattle on the Kennann Ranch near Seneca. Note: Union Co., NM adjoins Cimarron Co., OK which adjoins Baca Co., Colorado.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 103 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Third Week of Oct. Scattered reports of mystery choppers. In the early AM on the 20th, a blue helicopter circled "real low" near Midway and a dark green, "almost black" small helicopter was seen heading south into Oklahoma,
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 104 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Five helicopters "milled around" over the Heinmann Ranch, flying close together but not in formation. Three helicopters were reported in another sighting and, during a four-hour period, several "single" choppers were seen'. in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 105 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: There were several sightings of unidentified helicopters this date in eastern Union and NE Quay Counties.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 106 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Observers reported several separate sightings of unidentified helicopters in the area east of Nara Visa.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 107 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Mid-to-late October. Around the time that a 5-year old cow was mutilated near Hayden, an unidentified blue-green helicopter was seen in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 108 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: During the time area residents were reporting mystery helicopters, one rancher had 4 cattle mutilated. One night, the rancher's daughter was in the house alone. She saw a helicopter fly over a field about 100 yards away. It flew down below a building on the property, then flew to within 100 feet of the house. The sound seemed "muffled". The rancher was convinced that at least one of his mutilated cows had been dropped (into a pool of water) from above.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 140 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter flew over 2 ranches, flashing red, white and blue lights, with beams of white light shooting out intermittently.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 109 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter flew low over a house south of Springfield. Perhaps 12 mutilations occurred in the county in Sept.-November, along with scattered accounts of unidentified helicopters
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 110 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Early November. A rancher who had seen low-flying helicopters over his property during this period found that 4 of his cattle had disappeared.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 111 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: First Week. Hunters and ranchers reported sightings of a low-flying helicopter with a "pontoon-type" landing gear in the Buffalo vicinity. Four calves were mutilated in the Buffalo area during this period.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 112 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: (Approx. date) Three unidentified helicopters flew over the Howard Robinson property and, on another night during the week, two helicopters flew over the Robinson house.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 113 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: The Clayton Police Dept. reported that an unidentified helicopter landed just east of town. Other airborne lights were observed NE of Clayton and were thought to be helicopters.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 114 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Between October 30 & November 13. At least 30 unidentified helicopter and/or UFO sightings occurred during this period, while at least 4 cattle mutilations were reported. The FAA announced an investigation into the sightings of the unknown aircraft. Despite that announcement, the FAA has since denied having any knowledge or information about such an investigation.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 115 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: 2nd & 3rd (Tues.night, Wed.morning). Unidentified helicopters were seen over a wide area. Included were overflights over missile installations. Some objects seen were reported as helicopters, others simply nocturnal lights. At least two helicopters were involved as there were simultaneous sightings in widely separated areas.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Cascade, Teton, Pondera and Chouteau Counties MONTANA
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 119 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: The previous night's helicopter/UFO wave was repeated. At least 2 helicopters were reported at once over a missile site. Malmstrom Air Force Base verified that unidentified helicopters were in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Cascade, Teton, Pondera and Chouteau Counties, MONTANA
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 120 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: On the southeast edge of Great Falls, a law officer observed an unidentified helicopter which lifted off the ground and flew away.
