MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Nov 7th & 8th (Fri. and Sat. nights) UFOs were reported over missile installations. In a reply to press queries, the Strategic Air Command stated that "the craft were suspected to have been helicopters due to hovering ability of the craft, witness interpretations of the sound produced and placement of lights on the craft". Positive identification of the UFOs as helicopters was "precluded" due to darkness.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. ll7 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A mutilated calf was found on the 10th. There were unconfirmed reports of "silent helicopters" in the area at about that time.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: 118 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Between Aug 1975 & May 1976 Approximately 130 reports of unidentified helicopters and/or UFOs were logged during this period. It should be noted that this Montana flap (during a period in which livestock mutilations were being consistently reported), which involved craft over military installations, occurred at about the same time as similar "overflight" phenomena over military bases in Michigan and Maine.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Cascade County and surrounding counties, MONTANA
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 122 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Late 1975-through early 1976. Though cattle mutilations have occurred in New England, none were known during this period. However, there were disappearances of smaller animals and the mutilation of fowl such as geese. Some of the animal owners had seen low-flying, suspiciouslybehaving unmarked helicopters. Ufologist and well-known abductee Betty Hill investigated these events and compiled a report on the New England mystery choppers in 1976.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 116 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Three troop-carrier size helicopters were seen flying and landing near Lane - one of many mystery chopper reports during several weeks in this area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 123 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: When the sheriff and the complaintant reached the mutilation site, the victim's son and a hired hand were at the scene. They said the helicopter had circled over them, flying very low. It was so low and so clo_se that the witnesses could read a number on the craft: N9143F, which was apparently found to be registered to "City Car Terminal Company" of Detroit, Michigan.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 19 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Approx. the 24th. A rancher complained to the sheriff that, while he was on horseback, he saw a "military chopper" harassing his cattle.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 7 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A white helicopter was seen in the area of the Philmont Scout Ranch. A buffalo calf was found mutilated along an aircraft runway on the Scout Ranch on July 10th.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 8 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Investigators from the Society for the Investigation of the Unexplained (SITU), looking into mutilations in Montana, see & photograph a black helicopter over their campsite. "No one at any of the airports, military installations or local agencies would claim it as theirs".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 9 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter was heard flying low over a pasture after dark. One mutilated cow was found in the area on Monday and another on Tuesday. It was thought that both mutilations were done on the 26th.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 10 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: When a helicopter touched down on a farm, a group of children ran toward it; and it took off. There were other sightings in the area around this time. It was described at least once as being silver and blue. A classically mutilated calf was found on the same farm (on Oct. 1st) upon which the helicopter had landed.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 11 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Early Oct., late Sept., 1976. Four ranches reported 4 almost soundless helicopters, and one was observed as it harrassed and broke up a cattle herd (see Introduction).
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 12 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Sightings of a helicopter manned by a crew wearing red suits were verified by multiple independent witnesses. One classic mutilation occurred in the county in October. There were rumors of continued mutilations in November; but by then the authorities had clamped a firm lid on the matter.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Refs. 13, 14 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Oct. 20th, 21st (Saturday & Sunday) There were sightings of strange lights over several communities. They were thought to be helicopters but officers could not get close enough to make positive identification possible.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 15 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter with two occupants was heard and seen flying low over farmland, while a second chopper was heard but not seen.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 16 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A few nights before a classically mutilated cow was discovered, 3 objects identified as helicopters were seen flying low, and slowly. Two troopers were closing in when the objects rapidly gained altitude and vanished. One had a bright light on the bottom, running lengthwise "like a lighted rod".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 17 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter was seen flying out of the South Platte River bottoms and flying to the east, low over the river. A mutilated cow was discovered in the area on 12-17-76 and a calf turned up missing.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 18 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Albert Thomas saw a helicopter lift up & fly around his property. Thomas discovered the carcass of one of his cows, mutilated, the next day, January 18th. Other mutilations were reported in Cochise County during early 1977.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Mrs. C.D. Kirkham heard a helicopter go over. A mutilated cow was found on the property at 7:00 AM, Sunday. A fixed-wing aircraft was seen flying low over the same pasture the previous evening.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Three witnesses heard a helicopter flying over an area where 3 mutilations were reported during the week. One witness saw "bright, revolving lights".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 3 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Two helicopters flew low over a ranch where a bull was found mutilated the next day.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: On two occasions a cowboy "ran off" a low-flying black helicopter. At least two mutilations occurred in June in Huerfano County, adjoining Las Animas County (and the area of the sightings) on the north.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: On a ranch 17 miles NW of Daniel Junction, several witnesses watched a white helicopter with a blue bubble fly over the ranch house. The chopper was so low that children were throwing things at it. "Shortly after that" a mutilated cow was discovered on the ranch.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 7 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A lady in a farmhouse was awakened by a barking dog and looked out to see a "stock truck" backed up to a gate. The truck left when she turned on an outside light. The witness then heard the "distinct sound of a helicopter" nearby, and she could hear her cattle running around in the pasture.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 3 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Nov. 9th,10th (10:00 PM each date) a mystery helicopter sighting at same time each night by sheriff's investigator Don Rystrom, who had a calf of his mutilated (see Introduction).
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 4 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: On the Santa Clara Indian Reservation, two cows were mutilated within a day or two of each other, including one done on the night of November 12-13 during bad, rainy weather. A Santa Clara Pueblo resident reported hearing a helicopter early on the morning of the 13th.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.location: Los Alamos, Santa Fe and Rio Arriba Counties, NEW MEXICO
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 5,6 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Five horses were killed and mutilated in January in the Malaga area, south and east of Carlsbad. There were two or more helicopter sightings in the area of the mute sites, mostly during a period a day or two after a mutilation had occurred. Helicopters are not uncommonly seen in the area, though, and it is unclear whether these were marked or identified.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Between 2:00-3:00 AM. Near consistently-mutilation-plagued Dulce, NM. Police observed an object which might have been a helicopter - with green & red (like infra-red) lights hovering a directing a spotlight on the area of a mixing plant on land owned by rancher Manuel Gomez, who has had many cattle mutilated. The noiseless object rose and flew over the mountains NW of Dulce. As it passed over the mountains, State Policeman Gabe Valdez said he could faintly make out a form much like that of a hot-air balloon (There had been speculation that sophisticated balloon-type craft had been designed for the CIA and they were employed in mutilation events. Implicated in this scenario were famed balloonists from New Mexico. Also, 2 psychics in New Jersey stated their impressions around this time (Mar-Apr. 1979) that lighter-than-air craft were somehow involved in the mutilations.).
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 9, 10 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: May and June 1979. During a period in which 4 or 5 mutilations occurred, "dark" helicopters were reported flying around ranches and homes.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Dairyman Charles.Reynolds found a mutilated calf on July 10th, but estimated it died on the 8th. On that day he saw a helicopter hovering over his pasture. Reynolds heard the motor, went out for a look, and the craft flew away. Reynolds cited a helicopter/mutilation incident which had occurred in previous weeks near Martindale, Arkansas.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 3 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A helicopter flew over an area shortly before a cow turned up missing. The same cow was found mutilated on July 23rd. There were no tracks or ground markings, but limbs on trees just above the site were broken.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 4 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A blue helicopter without markings was seen near a site where, on Aug. 14th, a mutilated cow was found.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 5 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Several cattle mutilations, as well as unidentified (low-flying) helicopter sightings, were reported. In order to service an array of missile silos north of Little Rock Air Force Base regularly flew across this area, but at altitudes much greater than 500 feet.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 6 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Two helicopters flew over the day before a mutilated cow was discovered. A slow, low-flying, white fixed-wing airplane flew over on Saturday, the 25th.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 7 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: First week of August. Near Blackie - About a week before the well-publicized mutilation of a valuable 2500-lb. Simmental bull, a helicopter hovered 'over the ranch on which the bull was found. The chopper hovered "for quite a while", according to the landowner's wife, who added: "We're in the path of the airport, and lots of planes fly overhead, but this helicopter was different. It stayed over our land for a long time".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 8 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Littleton resident John Cumby watched [text cut off] was watching from his house. He called to his mother-in-law, who ran into the back yard. After the object had ascended out of Cumby's view, she could still see it. She watched the "ball" shape assume a "square" shape, with an appendage hanging out of it and "fluttering". The object vanished, then re-appeared a second or two later and a considerably distance to the (viewer's) right. It finally shot straight up and was lost from sight. No direct mutilation connection. However, in the autumn of 1980, a substantial number of classic livestock mutilations were reported in Colorado.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A mutilated bull was found, with the carcass burned on several areas as though "partially cooked in an oven". An unaccounted-for beam of light had swept over this valley near Springerville on the 24th or 25th. On the 29th1 Wednesday, a helicopter flew directly over the mutilation site.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A bull was found mutilated on the Stan Jones farm north of Calgary. Three triangular patches were worn into the nearby grass. A helicopter had been heard the night before (Sept. 27-28). A helicopter was seen nearby on the 28th, as the Jones family examined the bull at the site.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Night of Wed., Sept.30/Thurs. Oct. l. A 7-year-old Hereford cow was found dead & mutilated on the Charles Whitten property, under mysterious circumstances (see referenced source). That next day, Oct. 1, the Whittens heard a helicopter but could not see it. Then a low-flying airplane circled the pasture. There had been "talk" in a nearby town of "black helicopters" in the area.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A mutilated cow was found near MAY 1982 & JUNE 1982, end of May, first of June. Bloomfield on Fri., May 28. The owner's wife reported seeing a helicopter on the night of Mon., May 31. Then, around 6:00 PM on Tues., June 1, a witness saw a small green helicopter hovering over the mutilation [text cut off]
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A cow was mutilated on September 16 on the Bill Dzuris ranch near Calhan - a most interesting case (see reference plus the book AN ALIEN HARVEST by Linda Moulton Howe). Mr. Dzuris's sister, a Mrs. Kobilan, lives on a ranch nearby. Several times earlier in September, she could hear a helicopter but she was unable to see it. Then, at 3:00 AM on the 29th, she could both see and hear a chopper, flying low over the nearby Larry Mikita ranch. Later on the morning of the 29th, Mikita found a 6-year-old cow (like the Dzurises') dead and mutilated on his property.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 2 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: (late September-early November) Several livestock mutilations were reported here (and in adjoining Daggett County, Utah) during this period. According to Sweetwater County Deputy Sheriff Theron Wilde, helicopters were also being reported. On Sunday, the 10th of October, Wilde, whose own ranch is in the area of the mutilations, saw a small two-seater helicopter, with a glass bubble and a silver tail with red at the end of the tail. It was circling over the pasture lands. On November 7, the same or a similar chopper flew over in the same circling pattern. This area was the scene of a "shootout" of sorts between a reserve lawman and a mystery helicopter in 1977. (Ref. 3)
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Also, see INTRODUCTION [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A ranching couple near Lindon discovered a mutilated cow (their 3rd). A neighbor reported having seen a helicopter over the same pasture within one or two days of the discovery of the mutilated animal.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: No mutilation connection in this particular incident (although animal mutilations have been reported consistently for well over a decade in the area of Snohomish, King & Pierce Counties) - but it is of interest because of the description of the helicopter. Michael D. Hart and three other witnesses were camping near a river in Central King County. They heard a helicopter, then they finally saw it circling low over a dairy farm near North Bend. Through binoculars, the craft was seen to be all black, with no discernible markings whatsoever. The windows appeared tinted to prevent viewing into the cockpit. The witnesses said the chopper was a "Huey".
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. l [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: Late November or early December. A mutilated Hereford cow was found on the Eldon Butler ranch. The night before, Butler had heard a helicopter hovering about 300 yards from his house. Initially - although it was hovering and was "real loud" - he thought little of it, as military helicopters often flew over his property.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. l [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)

MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.desc: A female bovine was found with the heart and vagina missing and one teat missing from the udder. There was a small amount of blood on the animal's carcass, but none on the ground. Investigator Ed Teal of the Sheriff's office said the parts were "not just ripped out. They're specifically cut out. It's very weird." The site of the mutilation was on the Vandervoort farm, which adjoins the Tidmore farm, where a cow carcass was found with just the genitals missing approximately a year previously - around April 21, 1985. Both the Tidmore and Vandervoort farm adjoin yet another property - that of school principal Les Click. The night after the Vandervoort mutilation, Click heard a helicopter flying low over his farm.
MysteryHelicoptersAdams Timeline.ref: Ref. 1 [The Choppers - and the Choppers, Mystery Helicopters and Animal Mutilations, Thomas R. Adams, 1991](http://www.ignaciodarnaude.com/avistamientos_ovnis/Adams,Thomas,Choppers%20and%20the%20Choppers-1.pdf)
